songs.title: Losing My Religion
songs.fun_fact: The title is a Southern expression meaning 'at wit's end'. The mandolin-driven song became R.E.M.'s biggest hit. Peter Buck learned mandolin specifically for this track.

songs.title: Would I Lie To You?
